body: I claim that although Normandy Client is generating this data, it is not Normandy Server that needs to collect and expose this data. This sort of dashboarding and data analysis belongs in other projects, such as Experimenter and Test Tube.
body_text: I claim that although Normandy Client is generating this data, it is not Normandy Server that needs to collect and expose this data. This sort of dashboarding and data analysis belongs in other projects, such as Experimenter and Test Tube.
body_html: I claim that although Normandy Client is generating this data, it is not Normandy Server that needs to collect and expose this data. This sort of dashboarding and data analysis belongs in other projects, such as Experimenter and Test Tube.
